meanings.definition: The quality of being affordable or not costing much.
meanings.sent1: The inexpensiveness of the meal made it a popular choice for families on a budget.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate the inexpensiveness of this store; I can buy what I need without spending too much.
meanings.sent3: The party planner joked about the inexpensiveness of the decorations, saying they were 'dollar store chic'.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity in achieving inexpensiveness in her DIY projects was truly impressive.
meanings.sent5: The inexpensiveness of the hotel room was a pleasant surprise, allowing us to extend our vacation.
